title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.6 - Weekly basis of minimum wage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.6 - Weekly basis of minimum wage

State Regulations

The minimum wage provided by this Part shall be required
for each week of work, regardless of the frequency of
payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-2.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
